item.title: Oura Ring 4 Ceramic review: A colorful glow-up
item.description: If you want a pop of color and style, then the Oura Ring 4 Ceramic might be the smart ring for you.

item.title: OpenAI says it’s fixed ChatGPT’s em dash problem
item.description: OpenAI says users can now personalize ChatGPT to stop using the em dash in its output.

item.title: Five people plead guilty to helping North Koreans infiltrate US companies as ‘remote IT workers’

item.title: Boeing has a carbon emissions problem. Startup Charm Industrial is cleaning up.
item.description: The deal will see Charm Industrial collect forestry waste and transform it into a bio-oil it buries underground.
